fileUpload.title: Drop your file here
fileUpload.content: You can either drop your file here, or you can just click on this space

fileTooBig.title: File too big
fileTooBig.message: Your file is too big! Maximum size is {size}MB

default.title: Error
default.message:
There was an unexpected error on the server side!
Would you mind trying that again?

ProcessDeploymentFailedException.title: Process deployment failed!
ProcessDeploymentFailedException.message: There was some problem with your deployment. Please check whether it has *.bpmn or *.bpmn20.xml extension and a valid syntax.

ZipFileHasNoProcessesException.title: Processes archive deployment failed!
ZipFileHasNoProcessesException.message: We couldn't deploy any of the processes supplied in your archive. Please check it and try again.

ProcessDefinitionDoesntExistsException.title: Processes definition doesn't exist!
ProcessDefinitionDoesntExistsException.message: We couldn't find process definition you were asking for. Could you try again?
